title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

text: Artificial intelligence has the potential to scale drug discovery like never before.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t7.16
text: Find out how one pharma company uses AI on today's episode.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t12.040000000000001
text: I'm Frank Nestle from Sanofi and you're listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t22.56
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t26.24
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, Professor of Analytics at Boston College.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t30.4
text: I'm also the AI and Business Strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t35.8
text: And I'm Shervin Khodobande, senior partner with BCG,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t39.36
text: and I co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t42.68
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI for six years,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t48.879999999999995
text: interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t52.92
text: on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t56.92
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t61.08
text: Today, Shervin and I are talking with Frank Nestle,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t63.480000000000004
text: Global Head of Research and Chief Scientific Officer at Sanofi.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t67.08
text: Frank, thanks for talking to us.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t68.92
text: Welcome.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t69.96000000000001
text: It's really nice to meet you, Dr. Nestle.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t72.52000000000001
text: Hi, Shervin. Nice meeting you too.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t75.28
text: Frank, maybe start with your current role at Sanofi.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t78.16
text: What are you doing?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t79.76
text: I'm the Global Head of Research and CSO at Sanofi.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t83.12
text: Sanofi is really a company making medicines available across the world,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t87.04
text: across 100 countries with approximately 100,000 employees,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t90.80000000000001
text: providing medicines and vaccines literally to millions of people.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t94.4
text: We're currently going through a very exciting transformation.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t97.72
text: We've been originally in primary care and now transitioning into specialty care,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t102.64
text: providing medicines in immunology, oncology, rare disease,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t106.68
text: including rare hematology disease, neurology, as well as vaccines.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t110.88000000000001
text: And my role as Global Head of Research is to really discover

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t115.08000000000001
text: and then translate the next generation of breakthrough medicines

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t118.84
text: to patients who are really waiting.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t120.56
text: I can tell you that.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t122.12
text: Tell us a bit about your background, Frank,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t124.2
text: how you got started in your career and how you ended up here.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t128.52
text: I'm a clinician and a scientist.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t130.92000000000002
text: I trained originally in dermatology and clinical immunology, allerology,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t135.52
text: but I was always driven by the quest to make a difference to patients.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t140.4
text: And I did that by trying to understand disease mechanisms

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t144.08
text: and then translating those mechanistic insights into therapeutics,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t148.32000000000002
text: hopefully and ideally precisely tailored

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t151.84
text: to the needs of an individual patient or a patient population.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t155.32000000000002
text: Now it's called precision medicine, but that's what always drove me.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t158.92000000000002
text: And in terms of the science, I tried to manage to get to those disease mechanisms.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t163.2
text: One is the science of the immune system.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t165.67999999999998
text: And I'm happy to say with maybe all your listeners now that during the pandemic,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t170.72
text: we all became immunologists.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t172.32
text: So there's a lot of know-how out there about what is the difference

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t176.83999999999997
text: between an antibody, a T cell and a B cell.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t180.64
text: I'm not sure there's a lot of know-how.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t182.95999999999998
text: There's a lot of experts.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t184.2
text: So lots of experts that makes actually doing the science I do even more fun,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t188.52
text: because you can totally dominate any dinner conversation.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t193.4
text: The other topic I could easily talk about for quite a while is dermatology,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t197.24
text: which is always a nice topic across dinner rounds.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t200.24
text: But it's incredibly fascinating to think about the immune system.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t204.48000000000002
text: It's essentially a collection of mobile cells circulating through our body.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t209.04000000000002
text: And they move back and forth between tissues where cancer happens,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t212.76000000000002
text: autoimmune disease happens, and the blood.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t215.16000000000003
text: And they're really accessible via simple blood draw.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t218.44
text: And it's quite exciting to understand how this connected system,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t223.84
text: I strongly believe is all biology is connected, is playing out in cancer,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t228.4
text: for example, to protect us from cancer.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t230.24
text: And we have huge successes in checkpoint immunotherapy of cancer.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t234.88
text: But also, if it gets out of control, if it overreacts in terms of autoimmunity.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t240.48
text: And the fundamental hardwiring for the immune system

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t243.16
text: is really what we apply and exploit in vaccines.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t246.51999999999998
text: Our immune system has evolved to fight pathogens.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t250.88
text: Tell us how the new world versus old world of immunology

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t256.15999999999997
text: is being transformed by technology, possibly by better analytics, better AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t263.03999999999996
text: Yeah, so there's actually a great story

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t264.84
text: how the great conversions of life sciences with data sciences and engineering

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t271.4
text: has played out to increase our knowledge about the immune system.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t275.92
text: And it all converges on the topic of single cell immunology.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t280.68
text: We can now assess and analyse the immune system of a patient

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t285.88
text: with just a few thousand cells.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t287.44
text: And we do this by applying single cell immunology technologies

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t292.12
text: where we can study 2,000 genes per cell.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t295.16
text: So think about the magnitude of gene modifications we can study.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t299.28000000000003
text: If we take 100,000 cells and across these 100,000 cells,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t303.72
text: we study 2,000 genes per cell.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t306.08000000000004
text: And this has been possible because of progress in engineering, microfluidics.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t310.76000000000005
text: It has been possible because of AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t314.08000000000004
text: For example, at Sanofi, at our institute, we are writing code,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t319.64000000000004
text: we're writing AI algorithm to then essentially analyse those data

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t325.12
text: and to rediscover cell fates.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t328.44000000000005
text: And we annotate then if a cell is a B cell or a T cell

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t331.72
text: or some new immune cell we never ever heard about.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t334.6
text: The exciting fact is also that we can not only get cells from the blood,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t339.96000000000004
text: from circulation, we can go into, for example,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t343.04
text: the joints of a patient with arthritis or even the seroprospinal fluid

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t348.72
text: of a patient with multiple sclerosis.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t350.96000000000004
text: So all of a sudden we can go into the compartments where disease plays out

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t355.52000000000004
text: and then literally put this disease under,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t359.08000000000004
text: you could call it the molecular microscope.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t361.48
text: And if you think about the fact that the cell is the common denominator

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t366.16
text: of a physiological system, of the immune system,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t369.48
text: then it could call it essentially the atoms of the immune system.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t372.84000000000003
text: We can study the immune system literally at atomic level resolution.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t378.96000000000004
text: And the use of AI here is both to understand the mechanism

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t384.56
text: as well as to maybe come up with new drugs?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t388.52000000000004
text: Exactly.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t389.04
text: So the first part is, I'm always saying, first you have to explore

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t393.6
text: and create a map, a landscape of physiology and of pathology.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t398.16
text: And this is what we are currently doing.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t399.84000000000003
text: And then once you have all of that insight,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t401.72
text: you create the theory behind it, how mechanism plays out,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t405.04
text: and then you make drugs.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t406.52000000000004
text: First, we want to understand how disease mechanism plays out.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t410.04
text: And that's exactly where we use these AI algorithms.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t413.12
text: Imagine you have 100,000 cells and they have 2,000 genes up or down.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t417.88
text: And we don't know if it's a T cell, a B cell, or some new immune cell.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t421.0
text: So if you run a learning algorithm on these data sets,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t424.8
text: that algorithm gets better and better to actually tell us.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t428.0
text: So you essentially reorganize or rediscover

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t430.96
text: the cellular annotation of the immune system.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t447.88
text: What is AI?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t449.88
text: What is AI?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t451.88
text: What is AI?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t453.88
text: What is AI?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t454.88
text: It seems like in some applications of AI that we, Sam and I,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t459.88
text: you've been talking about, it's an existing business process that

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t463.36
text: gets improved a bit or optimized a bit.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t465.96
text: And Frank, you're talking about applications that wouldn't even

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t468.76
text: exist without AI, I would assume, right?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t470.96
text: Because the scale that you're talking about with thousands of cells

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t474.44
text: and thousands of genes, it appears to me

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t477.8
text: these would have been unsolvable problems without the use of AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t482.04
text: I tend to agree.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t483.36
text: I mean, always the question is, what do you mean by AI?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t486.68
text: There's a whole spectrum from AJI, you know, artificial general intelligence.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t491.92
text: And we're not there yet, to various applications of machine learning,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t495.48
text: where you, when I started off many years ago to use machine learning a process.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t501.32
text: These were just simple clustering algorithms or these were,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t506.24
text: for example, random forest type machine learning approaches.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t509.40000000000003
text: But now we can obviously do much more in terms of applying AI.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t513.6
text: The discovery of medicines is then a whole different order of challenge.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t518.12
text: And this is where essentially you get into this question of molecular design.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t522.6
text: You know, medicines come in different sizes and shapes.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t525.12
text: If they're below 500 dalton, then they're called small molecules,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t529.36
text: or above they're large molecules.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t531.36
text: Small molecules are your typical pills you take.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t534.04
text: And large molecules could be biologics, antibodies you inject.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t538.0799999999999
text: And as we know from COVID, you can inject antibodies to protect you from COVID.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t542.16
text: But you can also take small molecule pills to basically block,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t547.0
text: for example, the viral replication of the COVID virus.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t551.24
text: So how do you get to those molecules?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t553.24
text: You first have to understand your target.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t555.4399999999999
text: So, for example, if you think about a target in multiple sclerosis

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t560.3199999999999
text: or in systemic lupus, you have a certain target.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t563.48
text: It's a protein.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t564.84
text: And you have to understand the structure of that protein.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t567.32
text: And this is called structural enablement.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t569.36
text: We can now use fantastic technologies such as grile electron microscopy

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t575.16
text: or X-ray resolution of those targets.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t578.16
text: And we can discover their structure.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t581.08
text: But what we can also do is we can run virtually literally billions

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t585.6800000000001
text: of small molecules against those targets and then discover small molecules

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t591.4
text: hitting those targets in a way that it has a functional impact.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t595.08
text: And these are typically called an allosteric inhibitors.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t598.5600000000001
text: So an inhibitor which essentially binds to a target, to a protein,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t603.44
text: and does so in terms of an output which is functional.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t607.32
text: So it can then, for example, block a certain target, block a certain protein.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t612.12
text: And this is then the first step to a medicine

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t614.04
text: because we have all of a sudden a target.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t616.4
text: We have a disease where it plays a role.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t618.56
text: We have a tool compound, for example, a small molecule.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t621.5999999999999
text: And then we can take this starting chemistry to ultimately then get

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t626.2399999999999
text: to a real medicine.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t628.92
text: So you're talking about trying all these things.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t630.88

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t634.0
text: Or are you trying them virtually?

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t636.2399999999999
text: It's a combination of the real and the physical world.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t639.3599999999999
text: I'm always talking about AI as the chemist around the table.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t644.52
text: For example, if you want to come up with a new structure of a small molecule,

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t654.36

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t657.88
text: And you would have 300 chemist brains engaged

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t664.28

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t688.28

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t691.88

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t693.76

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t697.52
text: We call it like the first iteration of a potential medicine.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t701.56
text: And then this has to be optimized.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t703.16

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t717.88
text: Absolutely.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t734.9200000000001

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t737.84

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t739.96
text: There's nothing more interesting for a chemist

text: But it's a long road from this original hit to ultimately a clinical candidate.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t786.0799999999999

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t791.36
text: And they help us to reduce that enormous space to a much smaller space.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t796.52

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t807.76
text: If you use the support of a predictive model like an AI model,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t820.4799999999999

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t822.1999999999999

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t848.8

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t851.1999999999999
text: And ultimately, what this can lead to is that we reduce the timelines.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t855.24

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t925.4399999999999

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t926.52
text: And it also depends on the different steps of the value chain.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t931.3199999999999
text: When we make a medicine, we are testing different attributes.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t935.0799999999999
text: For example, just one attribute might be very potent binding.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

text: The next attribute might be highly specific binding,

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t942.68
text: not hitting other targets.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t944.1999999999999
text: The next attribute might be it's safe.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t953.44
text: Next attribute might be a molecule is well absorbed by the gut.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t958.4000000000001

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t964.0

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t969.08
text: And these models are trained.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t971.44
text: I'll give you a specific example.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t973.2800000000001

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t985.24
text: So we're running thousands of these CACO cell lines all the time.

id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t995.04

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle

text: what a good CACO cell line uptake molecule is.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
id: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle-t1006.16
text: And that ultimately then gives us a better and better model.

title: Precision Medicine in Pharma - Sanofi's Frank Nestle
